body: this gonna get good soon
i guess she was raped with tools and tortured bc of her pendant, poor kid
One hell of a prequel.

Just for anyone that still has some hope the main story has pretty much already confirmed that she will be raped at some point. In the latest chapter the doctors mentor who was replacing her limbs said that her “female parts” have almost been destroyed.

@kuroikiba7 u must be Merlin, youve described my situation perfectly.
I can lend you some of that edge, it ll help you scrape semen off your fingers, but promise to give it back

It only gets worse from here. All of her limbs were nearly falling off, these guys are going to sell her to a noble and he'll probably be the one to do it. Either that or she somehow gets away from these guys but ends up nearly dying because she falls off a cliff or some other deus ex machina. Though I find that possibility highly unlikely.
nigawiga you are the embodiment of retard.

@SirVanilla Agreed, pretty sure this is going into guro or some similarly disturbing shit, i have those blocked so this may be the last one i'm seeing. I like this mangaka's story about her healing, but this here about how she got injured in the first place... no thanks, burn it with fire.
@nigawiga Ow the edge. I'm guessing you're some 12 year old checking out NSFW sites on your mom's computer.
It's unlikely, but I wish those bastards get what they deserve in the main story.

@VoidTraveler calm yo tits bruh, ure a degenerate too.

Shes most likely gonna have her limb fucked so she cant run away again, serves her right, no runnin away from the cumzone
Sometimes "Tell don't show" is better. Making a manga about surviving tragedy and abuse just to make a spank material prequel rings hollow. Oh well, I'll just keep pretending this one doesn't exist.
